name: Four Little Knights
description:
Help! The Princess has vanished! She was last seen at a flower patch near the forest. Your quest is to guide the four little knights on a journey to find the princess and collect as many treasures as you can along the way.

How to play:

You can either control four knights at once, or play with multiple players and each control one or more knights.

Tap anywhere on the screen to jump, tap twice to double jump.
To play with multiple players, each player should tap on a different quadrant of the screen.

• Single player and multiplayer
• Play with up to 4 people
• Simple one button gameplay
• Leaderboards and achievements
